content: this is the perfect simply easy cowl / scarf for beginners and uses 3 basic stitches single half double and double_crochet it also introduces a little lace / filet crochet it s designed to allow the crocheter to follow as written or just do row of the stitches they are most comfortable with 200 yards of worsted weight yarn will produce a scarf approx 42 long and 6 wide after blocking
